fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Education and training, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: All relevant EU initiatives in the area of education, clinical practice and research which include, but not limited to: FP7, Horizon 2020, Marie Curie & ERC, EU Higher Education policy, European Research Area, Erasmus + program.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication: Researchers of LSMU regularly organize conferences on European financed research programs and research projects.
